slide.title: Switch
slide.example:
<?php
switch ( $a ) {
    case 1: echo "one"; break;
    case 2: echo "two"; break;
    case 3: echo "three"; break;
    case 4: echo "four"; break;
    case 5: echo "five"; break;
    case 6: echo "six"; break;
}
